content: One vegetarian-friendly option in Ardabil's local cuisine is "Kale Pache", a hearty soup made with sheep's head and feet, but can be made vegetarian by using vegetable broth and omitting the meat. The soup is traditionally served with bread and herbs. Another option is "Kofteh Tabrizi", a vegetarian meatball made with potatoes and chickpeas, and served with tomato sauce and bread.
